name: Pototo Hunt
description:
This game is where you are a potato and you gotta run away from chefs. Every time you shoot the chef, they add another one but they spin in circles. Try to survive the  LONGEST. Also comment your highest record!

                                                                                  Good Luck!

                                                 This game was made in less than 15 hours!  :)

                                                               I would also love for feedback!
